data.name: Fractal Fly - Alien City
data.detailed_description:
An additional fractal to explore in Fractal Fly!

This one looks like an extraterrestrial super structure built in space.
You'll find buildings as well as canyons in which you can fly into, like in some famous space war movies...
You can dive deep into the ground and discover many strange shapes, like a weirdly multi layered twisted city built on rocks.

After acquiring this DLC, you'll be able to wander freely in this fractal and explore it at your will, as many times and as long as you want.
And remember that before to acquire it, you can preview it directly into Fractal Fly app!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least NVidia GTX 970 or equivalent for VR mode
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works on screen as well as with a VR headset
